org.mt4j.util.opengl
Class GLStencilUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.util.opengl.GLStencilUtil

public class GLStencilUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Abstracts the OpenGL stencil buffer for clipping use.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

getInstance

public static GLStencilUtil getInstance()
Gets the single instance of StencilStack.

Returns:
single instance of StencilStack

beginDrawClipShape

public void beginDrawClipShape(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
Sets up the stencil buffer. After calling this method, every draw command will be written into the stencil buffer only, marking the clipping area for later.

Parameters:
gl - the gl

beginDrawClipped

public void beginDrawClipped(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
This method should be called after drawing the clipping shape into the stencil buffer using beginDrawClipShape. After invoking beginDrawClipped, we can now draw only where we drew the clipping shape.

Parameters:
gl - the gl

endClipping

public void endClipping(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
Ends the drawing to the clipped area only.

Parameters:
gl - the gl

isClipActive

public boolean isClipActive()

endClipping

public void endClipping(javax.media.opengl.GL gl,
                        AbstractVisibleComponent clipShape)
Ends the drawing to the clipped area and restores the previously used clip area if there is one.

Parameters:
gl - the gl
clipShape - the clip shape
